name: Reverse Me! 2 Rose
detailed_description:
The second of the “Reverse me!” trilogy. Inspired by the fairy tale of “Snow-White and Rose-Red”, Reverse Me! 2 Rose is the story of two sisters, a bear and an ungrateful dwarf.

Features
* A short and linear tale.
* Steam Achievements.
* Dual Language Story and User Interface. Both English and French appears at the same time.

short_description: The second of the “Reverse me!” trilogy. Inspired by the fairy tale of “Snow-White and Rose-Red”, Reverse Me! 2 Rose is the story of two sisters, a bear and an ungrateful dwarf.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 +
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 1280x720
